Title: WPF.DataForm
Description: Just a simple port of the silverlight DataForm to wpf.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Just a simple port of the silverlight DataForm to wpf.

To use the source you need .NET 3.5 SP1 and the WPF ToolKit Dll : http://wpf.codeplex.com/

You can download the first alpha of the DataForm including the WPF ToolKit Dll : WPF.DataForm 0.1
